fields.name: License agreement does not attempt to limit rights given by upstream
fields.description: The license agreement of the global product must not limit rights given by the upstream Open Source license for the code of the original Open Source component

fields.name: License agreement disclaiming responsability of other contributors
fields.description: The vendor’s license agreement must exclude all contributors from any warranty or any liability

fields.name: Strong Copyleft
fields.description: Derivative works or works based on the Open Source Software must be distributed under the initial license or another license approved by the initial license.

fields.name: Weak Copyleft
fields.description: Some categories of derivative works or of works based on the Open Source Software must be distributed under the initial license or another license approved by the initial license.

fields.name: SaaS : mentions
fields.description: Display to users interacting with your application remotely through a computer network specific mentions required by the license.

fields.name: Extra mentions in documentation
fields.description: Include specific mentions/attributions/ statements or warnings in the documentation.

fields.name: Non Tivoization
fields.description: Make available any methods, procedures, authorization keys, or other information required to install and execute modified versions the information required to run a modified version of the software (including  provision of load certificates) on the hardware.

fields.name: SaaS : network Copyleft
fields.description: Derivative works or works based on the Open Source Software must be made available to users interacting with your application remotely through a computer network under the initial license or another license approved by the initial license.

fields.name: Providing CSC to end user
Indemnification of contributors
fields.description: If any contributors is attacked because of the usage or distribution of the product, then they must be defended and indemnified

fields.name: Obnoxious advertising clause
fields.description: Display of specific content in any advertising document mentioning the features or the use of the software.

fields.name: Preserve IP mentions in Source code
fields.description: Keep all legal notices and license texts intact, including in the headers.

fields.name: License and copyright notices in documentation
fields.description: Reproduce within the documentation the complete text of the licenses, copyright notices and other texts related to involved Intellectual Property.

fields.name: Display copyright and licence in Program
fields.description: Display particular mentions during the execution and the installation of the software (in the dedicated place for legal mentions).

fields.name: No use of names for endorsement
fields.description: Names of the project authors/contributors are not to be used for commercial or promotional purposes.

fields.name: Patent Peace
fields.description: Enforcing patents against licensees or making a non-infringement agreement contrary to the license is prohibited.

fields.name: Marking Modifications
fields.description: Document all modifications made in the source code of third-party Open Source components.

fields.name: Respect trademarks
fields.description: Don’t use elements of the project that may be covered by Trademark Law (project name, logo) in external communications.
